title: Monkey Uses Dried Up Leaves To Save Water, Compels People To Ask 'Who Are The Real Animals?'
text:
Monkey Uses Dried Up Leaves To Save Water, Compels People To Ask 'Who Are The Real Animals?'

Monkey Uses Dried Up Leaves To Save Water, Compels People To Ask 'Who Are The Real Animals?'

‘Turn off the tap and don't waste water.’ We have heard this line many times, but how often do we really follow it? Mostly, we do not!

But, this monkey not only did his bit to save water but also taught us our responsibilities.

This video of a monkey has been making rounds on the internet for all the right reasons. The video shows a monkey sitting in front of a pipe from which water is gushing out. The monkey then uses dried leaves to stop the water from flowing out. This has struck a chord with people on social media.

This simple act has created a stir among the people. The tweet was captioned as, ‘If other beings of the wild can have such grace, intelligence and sensitivity... then I really don’t know what went wrong with us humans.’
